text: HP computers not on BIOS released after September can get stuck in a boot loop and need a new motherboard. Here's what hp released about this last Monday: https://support.hp.com/us-en/document/ish_9428115-9416529-16 I have two questions for all of you: - Have you had any issues in your environment with this? If so, to what scale? - It's unclear what KB causes this. I assume it's all the CUs from October. The article mentions that it any from July or late. Anyone have better info about what KB causes this? If it's any CU since July I don't think it's going to cause issues for us. But if it's just the October CU I don't want to brick any significant number of our 800 HPs and coordinate new motherboards. -- %40googlegroups.com

metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] October CU and HP motherboards
